All-Inter-Ac League Boys' Basketball Team Updated: February 14, 2017 — 3:28 PM EST 117 Share Rick O'Brien Staff Writer 
Rick O'Brien has been writing for the Inquirer since 1993, primarily covering high school sports in Southeastern Pennsylvania. He focuses on football and boys' basketball and baseball, with other events (Penn Relays, regattas on the Schuylkill, etc.) and some pro sports mixed in. More by Rick O'Brien 
All-Inter-Ac League Boys’ Basketball Team 
MVP: Kyle McCloskey, Germantown Academy 
FIRST TEAM 
Kyle McCloskey, Germantown Academy, Sr. 
Evan-Eric Longino, Germantown Academy, Sr. 
Conner Delaney, Episcopal Academy, Sr. 
Kharon Randolph, Haverford School, Jr. 
Nick Alikakos, Episcopal Academy, Sr. 
Christian Ray, Haverford School, So. 
SECOND TEAM 
Deuce Turner Malvern Prep, Fr. 
Mason Williams Penn Charter, Jr. 
Ryan Holmes, Penn Charter, Fr. 
Billy Corcoran, Malvern Prep, Jr.
